solution_line_template: Corveus lacks {recommended_sleep_hours} - {current_sleep_hours} = <<{recommended_sleep_hours}-{current_sleep_hours}={daily_sleep_lack}>>{daily_sleep_lack} hours of sleep every day.
Therefore, Corveus' total hours of lack of sleep every week is {daily_sleep_lack} x {days_in_week} = <<{daily_sleep_lack}*{days_in_week}={weekly_sleep_lack}>>{weekly_sleep_lack}.
